description:
The marketing and growth meetup with industry experts. Learn all about growth hacking strategies and take part in the networking and Q&A sessions. 
At April’s edition Rui Santos Couto (https://www.linkedin.com/in/ruisantoscouto/) will be talking about Branding for Startups. He will share some do’s and dont’s that startups should follow in order to start building a brand without compromising the performance. 
More about the speaker:
Rui Santos Couto is a marketing geek with 10 years of experience in events, retail and digital marketing. He’s a practitioner and enthusiast of Inbound Marketing and the AARRR funnel. Rui is currently the CMO of Bitmaker and a marketing advisor of Infraspeak, ShiftForward, LabOrders and many more.
name: Let's Grow Again #14
